title: MemoLink
description: A personal "status tag" - express yourself with pictures and GIFs on a cute, mini screen, at work or at home. Link with friends to send messages and share the fun!

title: Tetrify
description: An intuitive interface for creating animations of falling Tetrominoes, leveraging ML techniques to perform optimized simulations.

title: Distributed Smarthome
description: Master's project - A distributed, highly performant, customizable, and modular IoT smarthome hub ecosystem.

title: LED Controller
description: A mobile web app, server, and ESP web socket client for controlling addressable LED strips.

title: Magic IoT Orbs
description: A set of three IoT-connected orbs which all change color in sync whenever one of them is activated.

title: Budget Manager
description: An Android app to help manage personal spending money by splitting into budgets and monitoring trends.

title: Spotify Worldwide
description: A web app that uses the Spotify API to facilitate expanding music tastes, with fun game-like features. Made as a 48-hr Hackathon project.

title: "Planet Stonedog"
description: An in-browser resource management game, made as a 24-hr SBUHacks hackathon project with some friends.

title: Auto-Watering System
description: An Arduino project designed to automate the process of watering several house plants.

title: Personal Website
description: A website to showcase my work and help people get to know me a little better.

title: Security Analysis of Contact Tracing Apps
description: I was a student researcher on Prof. Joydeep Mitra's 'Security Analysis of Contact Tracing Apps' research project, which seeks to analyze and scrutinize the security of the COVID-19 contact tracing Android apps endorsed by each U.S. state. The project involves decompilation of .apk files and in-depth analysis of the generated code.

title: Coffee House Comics
description: A web-based community platform for creating and sharing comics & interactive stories.

title: Top 5 Lister
description: A final project (individual) for CSE316 at SBU - a MERN web app which allows users to create, share, and view lists of their top 5 favorite items in any category they choose.

title: Collaborative Document Editor
description: A collaborative document editor based on Operational Transformations (OT) with emphasis on scaling for performance under load.

title: Arch Linux Scripts
description: A collection of scripts to install and configure Arch Linux in an automated, customized way.

title: Colorful IoT Lamps
description: A set of IoT connected color-changing lamps, designed for some friends to facilitate staying connected through trying times.

title: Cryptocurrency Energy Analysis
description: An analysis of alternative cryptocurrencies and the impact they have on the environment due to the energy they consume.
